root.name: Sega Vintage Collection: ToeJam & Earl
root.description: OverviewSega Vintage Collection: ToeJam Earl is a video game compilation developed by M2 and published by Sega on November 6, 2012 for the Xbox 360 (via Xbox Live Arcade). Part of the Sega Vintage Collection series, the compilation includes both Sega Genesis games from the ToeJam Earl franchise: ToeJam Earl and ToeJam Earl: Panic on Funkotron.Each game includes various features, such as time trial modes (where players complete a certain task in a certain part of the game), save states, and replays (that can be shared with other players).All three games were also released separately for the PlayStation 3 (via PlayStation Network), each including all of the features of the Xbox Live Arcade version plus twelve trophies for each game (nine bronze, two silver, and one gold).
